Package Controller

Class EditCustomer_Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.EditCustomer_Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class EditCustomer_Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller class for the Edit Customer form. Allows the user to edit the data values for an existing customer.

    • Method Detail

      • countrySelect

        void countrySelect​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        Clears the division combo box when the country box is clicked. This ensures that the division box can refresh with valid divisions for the selected country.
        Parameters:
        event - The country combo box is clicked.

      • comboDivisionDisplay

        void comboDivisionDisplay​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        Sets the items of the division combo box based on which country is selected in the country combo box. Displays an error message if no country is selected.
        Parameters:
        event - The division combo box is clicked.

      • onActionClearForm

        void onActionClearForm​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Clears all the data from the form so that the user can start over.
        Parameters:
        event - The CLEAR ALL button is clicked.

      • onActionSaveCustomer

        void onActionSaveCustomer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Saves changes to a customer to the database. Checks to make sure fields are not blank before adding and displays an error message if they are.
        Parameters:
        event - The Save button is clicked.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • onActionCancel

        void onActionCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Cancels the edit of a customer from the database. Displays a confirmation message before canceling to ensure data is not lost.
        Parameters:
        event - The Cancel button is clicked.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Initializes the Edit Customer form. Populates the text fields and combo boxes with the values from the customer the user selected on the main menu.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url -
        resourceBundle -
